column4: hey i am having some problems getting compiz-fusion to work with dual monitors any ideas? or where should i be looking?
what video card?
is it an nvidia or ati?
try nvidia-settings, it will help you very much :d
sudo apt-get install nvidia-settings and then run sudo nvidia-settings to use it :)
how is it going?
ok, just a sec, do you have the two monitors enabled already?
ok, whats the error? (could you please type filloy: before every messange so then windows flashes :p thank you!)
sorry will do :)
The program 'gtk-window-decorator' received an X Window System error.
wait wait, dont flood the room
http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/46783/
ok, it seems like you have a very high resolution, can you tell me what resolution you are using?
ok, try to put your resolution under 1600x
anything?
working on it
do i have to use twinview?
yes, no compiz otherwise, with 2 monitors at least. so you have to use twinview
how do i restart x server so the changes i make in nvidia-settings take affect?
log out and then Control Alt Backspace
ok now it is saying i need XRandR X extension
